alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:58PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR WAGONER...WEST CENTRAL CHEROKEE...NORTHWESTERN MUSKOGEE AND SOUTHEASTERN TULSA COUNTIES... At 657 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles north of Stonebluff to 4 miles west of Wagoner to 10 miles south of Chouteau, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Broken Arrow... Wagoner... Bixby... Coweta... Haskell... Okay... Hulbert... Porter... Tullahassee... Stonebluff... Sequoyah State Park... Oneta... Redbird... Leonard... Choska... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
